summary: A collection of integration tests that validate the MusicGen model’s ability to generate audio from textual prompts under various conditions, including conditional and unconditional generation, different decoding strategies (greedy and sampling), and the use of classifier‑free guidance, as well as checking the correctness of output logits.
business_intent: Guarantee the quality, stability, and performance of the music generation service before release, supporting product reliability and compliance with expected behavior.
